text: COPENHAGEN, April 12 Denmarks state-owned railway operator DSB will buy electric trains from Frances Alstom in a deal worth at least 20 billion Danish crowns ($3.2 billion), the countrys Transport Minister Benny Engelbrecht said on Monday. ($1 = 6.2442 Danish crowns) (Reporting by Jacob Gronholt-Pedersen; editing by David Evans)
